Project CsGL.Util

Class Summary
CFunction This class is an helper class to generate any call to any WINAPI C-function pointer.
Keyboard This class gather information about keyboard state.
Mouse a class to access mouse position from anywhere.
NativeException this class manage OS specific error
Pointer This class allocate standart C memory.
ScreenForm a form which the screen definition when it's made visible, and fit to it.
